comments.text:
STR
 (1) Open FF, go to about:blank
 (2) Ctrl-n to open a new window, navigate to google.com
 (3) Mouse over a link on google to get "hand" cursor
 (4) Alt-tab to switch back to about:blank window

The cursor should change from the "hand" back to a pointer when switching back to about:blank, but it stays a "hand".  This works properly in FF on gtk2.
